Token.Abstract: The RKConfigurationDelegate formal protocol defines methods enabling the centralization of RKRequest and RKObjectLoader configuration. An object conforming to the protocol can be used to set headers, authentication credentials, etc.
Configure a request before it is utilized

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: A request object being configured for dispatch

Token.Abstract: Configure an object loader before it is utilized

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: An object loader being configured for dispatch
